resources.string: When this service is enabled, Lightning Launcher will open automatically when you hover the cursor over the App Library icon for about half a second. (This may make it difficult to access the default launcher)
Launching 2D apps in their own window allows for easy multitasking, but will cause certain apps to not always launch.\n\nIf you have issues, disable this option.

1. Press CONTINUE to open accessibility settings.
2. Click on LightningLauncher
3. Switch the service on or off at the top of the page.

When it's on, you can open LightningLauncher by hovering the cursor over the "App Library" button on the dock.
Click a group to move the selected app.
%d apps selected. Click a group to move them.
